title: Organizer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Repurpose someone each night. They become an Event with their role's attributes applying to all phases and are no longer a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may repurpose two players instead each full moon.
- If you win, all repurposed Events become players again and win with you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill or repurpose all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 2396
*Goal: You cannot win. You are an event, not a role.*
